name: Badger & Winters
description:
Founded by Madonna Badger in 1994, Badger & Winters is an advertising, branding and design agency specializing in creating powerful ideas that establish enduring emotional connections with women. At Badger & Winters, we never underestimate the power of a woman.
For over twenty years, our goal has been nothing short of brand love creatively led by women. We have worked with some of the most important brands in the world.
